ygData.subject: Re: Dissonance damage?
ygData.msgSnippet: I d like to know this too. Last night in Crushbone - I derailed a 6 cent, 2 legionairre, 2 oracle, Lord Darish train with my horn and Denon s (lvl 18 song). A
ygData.messageBody:
I'd like to know this too.

Last night in Crushbone - I derailed a 6 cent, 2 legionairre, 2 oracle,
Lord Darish train with my horn and Denon's (lvl 18 song).

A bit later - I think every cent and legionairre in CB came boiling to the
zone - I got a lot of them, but Dvinn was hiding in the middle of them -
punched me - and punched me backwards INTO the zone.

Like Chords - all you get is a wince message.

Only way I can think to check damage - I dual a buddy - and have him tell
you how much it does. That I haven't done yet.

Speaking of horns - I've seen on this list several times where a mino horn
doubles between wind and brass - methinks this isn't correct. I can get it
to do a wind song - and although it works with brass - so does singing - so
now I'm back to shlepping a how orchestra around with me again.




At 07:17 AM 7/14/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Tracey <thershey@...>
>
>
>
>Hail friends,
>
>As simple question I cannot figure out for the life of me:
>
>How do you know how much damage your Chords of Dissonance dishes
>out? When I hit a critter with it, I only get the message that he
>"winces". Now, I know I'm hitting pretty good at lev 17 using
>a mandolin because I've tried only using the chord and not attacking
>and the crit's life bar goes down at a good rate. But frankly,
>I'd like to know exactly how much damage I'm putting to him
>so I can measure its use against Bellow.
>
>Thanks for any info. you can pass along.
>
>Yours in Song,
>
>A little bard named True
>
>--
>Tracey Amey Hershey
>thershey@...
>
